title: Congressional GOP feel the pressure as Trump poll numbers remain low
description: Kasie Hunt and Brendan Buck discuss the chances for a Covid relief bill in the House. Glenn Plaskin recalls his 1990 interview with Donald Trump.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
